divs: sighting detailsi am an avid skywatcher and on the evening of 10\18\07 at around 6:30pm i went outside and got on top of my roof and just was washing the sky but nothing interesting was happening so i went back inside my house.the timewas about 7:15pm so i could put a reminder on my t.v for 8:00pm. i probably took 5 minutes tops and went back outside. the sky was still clear and there was light outside and everything was normal nothing strange, all the regular stuff i normally see (planes, some birds, insects,) and at around 8 as the sun was setting it was getting a little dark but still good viewing. i guess it was about 10 to 15 minutes past 8pm when i saw from north going south a low imnot sure how high it was but well below a plane maybe about the height of a helicopter. a greyish almost cloud like color and it seemed at times see through like a cloud it was about the 50 feet long and made no sound it was kind of like a sonic wave almost that's the best way i can explaine it.i did have my digital camera with me but as soon as i saw it moving over the sky i kind of couldn't beleive it and i almost froze then i grabed my camera and took 4 to 5 pictures but when i brought my camera to work to look at them there was nothing on them but the tops of the trees and the sky. i would like to also tell you about an orb that i saw about a week ago also just over my house. at first i thought it was a peace of cotton that was getting some glare off the sun the time was about 6:00 to 6:30 pm on thursday oct. 11 2007 and it moved from east to west. i was staring up with my shades on and i caught a glare but as i said i figured it was cotton but it seemed to give off it's own light source the farther west it went and i lost track of it. i saw it for maybe 2 minutes or less and it was as big as a golf ball and about 20 to 30 feet above my house.
